pageTitle: EA Modification & Enhancement in Accra Central - Expert MQL Developers | TradeMetrics Pro
metaDescription: Professional EA modification and enhancement services in Accra Central. Add features, fix bugs, optimize code for MT4/MT5 Expert Advisors. Fast turnaround, quality guaranteed.
heroHeadline: Expert EA Modification & Enhancement Services in Accra Central
heroSubheadline: Upgrade Your Trading Bots with Professional MQL Development in Ghana's Financial Hub
description: Located in the heart of Ghana's financial district, TradeMetrics Pro delivers premium Expert Advisor modification and enhancement services to traders and businesses throughout Accra Central and the Greater Accra Region. Whether you need bug fixes, new indicators added, improved risk management, or complete modernization of legacy EAs, our experienced MQL4/MQL5 developers transform underperforming trading bots into profitable automation tools. Serving the bustling CBD with its concentration of banks, forex brokers, and trading firms, we understand the demands of institutional and retail traders in Accra Central who require rapid turnaround and professional quality. Our EA enhancement services include adding trailing stops, breakeven logic, time filters, news avoidance, partial close functions, multi-timeframe confirmations, dashboard panels, and remote monitoring capabilities. We also specialize in optimizing slow or inefficient code, fixing compilation errors in outdated EAs, converting MT4 EAs to MT5, and adding protective features against broker manipulation. From small tweaks to comprehensive rebuilds, we breathe new life into your existing Expert Advisors while maintaining their core profitable logic. Based in Accra but serving traders globally, we combine local market knowledge with international development standards.
shortDescription: Professional EA modification and enhancement services in Accra Central. Expert MQL developers add features, fix bugs, optimize performance, and modernize MT4/MT5 Expert Advisors for traders in Ghana's financial capital.
benefits: Save money compared to building a new EA from scratch

14 days of post-delivery support and adjustments

process.title: EA Analysis & Consultation
process.description: Share your EA (.ex4 or .mq4 file) and describe desired modifications. We analyze the current code, identify limitations, and discuss enhancement opportunities specific to your trading goals in Accra Central's market environment.

process.title: Detailed Proposal & Quote
process.description: Receive a comprehensive proposal outlining proposed changes, technical approach, timeline, and fixed-price quote. We ensure transparency about what's possible and any constraints before starting work.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: Our MQL developers implement modifications using best practices, test thoroughly on demo accounts, and ensure backward compatibility. All changes are documented for your reference.

process.title: Quality Assurance
process.description: We compare old vs enhanced EA performance through backtesting and forward testing, verify all features work correctly, and ensure code quality meets professional standards.

process.title: Delivery & Support
process.description: Receive updated EA files (.ex4/.mq4 or .ex5/.mq5), detailed changelog, installation instructions, and 14 days of support for any adjustment requests or technical assistance.

pricingInfo: EA modification services in Accra Central start at $100 for simple enhancements (adding an indicator, time filter, or basic feature). Mid-level modifications (risk management improvements, dashboard additions) range $200-400. Complex rebuilds and comprehensive enhancements cost $500-800. All quotes are fixed-price after initial analysis. Contact us for a free consultation and accurate quote based on your specific needs.
serviceArea: Accra Central (CBD), Makola Market, Accra Financial District, and surrounding Greater Accra areas within 40km
availability: Monday-Friday 9AM-6PM GMT, Weekend support available for urgent modifications
qualifications: Expertise in MT4 and MT5 platform architecture
guarantees: Code quality guarantee - clean, commented, optimized
Backward compatibility when modifying existing EAs

h2Headings: Why Choose Our EA Modification Services in Accra Central?
EA Modification Process for Accra Traders
Pricing for EA Enhancement in Accra Central
Contact Our Accra Central EA Development Team

faq.question: Can you modify an EA if I only have the .ex4 file without source code?
faq.answer: In most cases, yes. We can decompile .ex4 files and modify the logic, though this process takes longer than working with source code. However, heavily protected or obfuscated EAs may be impossible to modify without the original .mq4 source code. Contact us to assess your specific EA.

faq.question: How much does EA modification cost in Accra Central?
faq.answer: Simple modifications (adding an indicator or time filter) start at $100-200. Medium complexity enhancements (risk management improvements, dashboards) range $200-400. Complex modifications (major functionality overhauls) cost $500-800. We provide fixed-price quotes after analyzing your EA and requirements.

faq.question: My EA stopped working after a MetaTrader update. Can you fix it?
faq.answer: Absolutely! This is one of our most common requests from traders in Accra and globally. MetaTrader platform updates sometimes break older code. We'll modernize your EA to work with current MT4/MT5 builds and ensure compatibility with future updates.

faq.question: How long does EA modification take?
faq.answer: Simple modifications: 1-3 days. Medium complexity: 5-7 days. Complex enhancements: 1-3 weeks. We serve Accra Central's busy trading community with fast turnaround times and provide accurate timeline estimates after initial analysis.

faq.question: Can you add new features to an EA developed by another programmer?
faq.answer: Yes, we regularly enhance EAs created by other developers. Whether purchased from MQL5 marketplace, Fiverr, or coded by another developer, we can add features, fix bugs, and optimize performance as long as we have access to the source code.

faq.question: Do you provide support after delivering the modified EA?
faq.answer: Yes! All EA modification projects include 14 days of free support for adjustments and technical assistance. If issues arise with the modifications, we fix them at no cost. Extended support packages are available for ongoing maintenance.

faq.question: Can you convert my MT4 EA to work on MT5?
faq.answer: Absolutely! MT4 to MT5 migration is one of our core specializations. We convert your MT4 EA to MQL5 while maintaining all functionality and can add MT5-specific enhancements like improved backtesting and multi-asset support.

faq.question: How do I get started with EA modification services in Accra Central?
faq.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp, email, or phone. Share your EA file (if you have source code, include that), describe what modifications you need, and we'll provide a free consultation, technical analysis, and fixed-price quote within 24 hours.

ctaText: Get Your EA Enhanced Today - Free Consultation
